You Can Make a Difference

Search for a job

Bliblioneers/bli.bli.o.neers/



Bliblioneers are the very core of Blibli.com existence, the greatest strength that makes Blibli.com what it is today. Together, we take strides to make cutting-edge ideas and innovation to live our life purpose. As the DNA of every Bliblioneers, we let RESPECT to be our guidelines to achieve what we aspire. We make every judgment and call through RESPECT. We honor fellow Bliblioneers through their RESPECT. And we find the next Bliblioneers through the DNA of RESPECT that we find within them.





RESPECT

Risk Taking

Don’t overthink. As long as you don’t move backwards or compliantly remain on the same spot, just do it! We treasure calculated risk taker.

Excellence

Be an overachiever because complacency is a pitfall. History proved itself that only paranoid survives.

Serving

Focus on what to give than to receive and be humble. With it, neither praise nor disgrace can touch you.

Passionate and Proud

Passion is the fuel to accomplish the unimaginable. Stay true to it and be proud of what you build.

Employee’s Great Place to Work

Bliblioneers build relationship through open communications. They criticize hard, but support harder. They learn from one another and accept each other’s imperfections.

Customer Focus

Focus on taking care of customers and work backwards. The formula has always been the same:
ME < TEAM < COMPANY < CUSTOMERS

Teamwork

Build a synergy out of trust. Let your surplus exceeds others deficits and vice versa.
